page.title: 02 LOCAL AMENITIES
page.content: The area concerned contains a total of less than twenty different amenities. Most of these are centered in or around Binfield Heath. These include several Public Houses one of which we will look at in greater detail later, as it has an interesting local history. Other amenities include two Post Offices, a chip shop, two general stores, a garage (which has to serve a very large area, but because of the low population, does no more business than one in a major town), two public parks, a church, a water pumping station (in Caversham) and a bus service which serves only a small area to the south of the section.
